summary.span: 指定用于 .NET Framework 远程处理的自动反序列化的级别。

span.span: Specifies the level of automatic deserialization for .NET Framework remoting.

remarks.format: ## Remarks .NET framework 远程处理提供两个级别的自动反序列化，低和完整。.NET Framework remoting provides two levels of automatic deserialization, Low and Full. 低反序列化级别可帮助保护计算机免受反序列化攻击进行反序列化仅与的最基本的远程处理功能关联的类型。The Low deserialization level helps protect against deserialization attacks by deserializing only the types associated with the most basic remoting functionality. 所有类型的完整反序列化级别支持自动反序列化该远程处理支持在所有情况下。The Full deserialization level supports automatic deserialization of all types that remoting supports in all situations. 有关列表的.NET framework 远程处理类型该低，并且完全支持，请参阅[ [ \]](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/313a0e88-5b2b-4a17-8391-0ddf9f7a787b)。For a list of the .NET Framework remoting types that Low and Full support, see [[\]](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/313a0e88-5b2b-4a17-8391-0ddf9f7a787b). 以编程方式或通过使用应用程序配置文件，你可以设置此枚举的成员。You can set the members of this enumeration programmatically or by using an application configuration file. 有关示例，请参阅[ [ \]](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/313a0e88-5b2b-4a17-8391-0ddf9f7a787b)。For examples, see [[\]](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/313a0e88-5b2b-4a17-8391-0ddf9f7a787b). > [!CAUTION] > 请不要认为控制反序列化是应用程序所需的唯一安全机制。Do not assume that controlling deserialization is the only security your application requires. 在分布式应用程序，即使很大程度控制序列化可能无法防止恶意客户端截获通信并以某种方式使用它，即使只显示给其他人的数据。In distributed applications, even a high degree of control over serialization might not prevent malicious clients from intercepting the communication and using it in some way, even if that is merely showing data to others. 因此，虽然低反序列化级别提供一定程度上防范某些类型的基于自动反序列化的攻击，但你必须仍评估是否要使用身份验证和加密来帮助保护的机密性你数据。Therefore, although the Low deserialization level provides some protection against certain types of attack based upon automatic deserialization, you must still evaluate whether to use authentication and encryption to help protect the confidentiality of your data.
